title: Old RP card was to old

embed.description: Post with 1 views. Rip old Riot points Card

body: i was cleaning out the computer room and i stumbled upon something very interesting, a game case for league of legends. it came with a cool map and showing of some of the champs u can play like Jax, Master Yi and annie but there was another surprise in there. A $10 Riot Point card! Why i never used it was beyond me but i was excited, Dark star Kha'zix here i come! I find a penny and i go to scratch off the grey stuff that covers the code and to my surprise the code gets scratched off with they grey stuff that covers it. My guess is that the california heat was to much and probably melted it together. Somewhere there is an Imgur link to my sad adventure. I was wondering if at all i could still get the Rp even though the card is messed up. If not i completely understand ill just hate you forever :D also i took those pictures via Snapchat

replies.body: We should still be able to help out as long as the code still hasn't been used. Reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you can, and they'll be able to help soon.
